inclusion.label: not_met
inclusion.evidence: Patient has anaplastic astrocytoma, not oligodendroglioma or mixed oligoastrocytoma.

exclusion.label: triggers
exclusion.evidence: Patient received temozolomide and CPT-11 with Avastin, which is a form of chemotherapy. Additionally, patient underwent field radiation t10-l1.

notes: Karnofsky status unknown due to lack of information in patient text. Exclusion criteria likely triggers due to prior chemotherapy and cranial irradiation.
